body_html:
I compiled pytorch from source with commit 3e5c121, which is from 2 days ago. Here's my numpy config:

>>> np.__config__.show()
openblas_info:
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib']
    language = c
    libraries = ['openblas', 'openblas']
    define_macros = [('HAVE_CBLAS', None)]
atlas_3_10_threads_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
atlas_threads_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
lapack_opt_info:
    include_dirs = ['/usr/include/atlas']
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib/atlas-base/atlas', '/usr/lib/atlas-base']
    language = f77
    libraries = ['lapack', 'f77blas', 'cblas', 'atlas', 'f77blas', 'cblas']
    define_macros = [('NO_ATLAS_INFO', -1)]
atlas_info:
    include_dirs = ['/usr/include/atlas']
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib/atlas-base/atlas', '/usr/lib/atlas-base']
    language = f77
    libraries = ['lapack', 'f77blas', 'cblas', 'atlas', 'f77blas', 'cblas']
    define_macros = [('NO_ATLAS_INFO', -1)]
blas_opt_info:
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib']
    language = c
    libraries = ['openblas', 'openblas']
    define_macros = [('HAVE_CBLAS', None)]
openblas_lapack_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
atlas_3_10_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
lapack_mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
blas_mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE

body:
I compiled pytorch from source with commit 3e5c121c56e42e8b303962ab0db532afbed128af, which is from 2 days ago. Here's my numpy config:

```
>>> np.__config__.show()
openblas_info:
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib']
    language = c
    libraries = ['openblas', 'openblas']
    define_macros = [('HAVE_CBLAS', None)]
atlas_3_10_threads_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
atlas_threads_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
lapack_opt_info:
    include_dirs = ['/usr/include/atlas']
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib/atlas-base/atlas', '/usr/lib/atlas-base']
    language = f77
    libraries = ['lapack', 'f77blas', 'cblas', 'atlas', 'f77blas', 'cblas']
    define_macros = [('NO_ATLAS_INFO', -1)]
atlas_info:
    include_dirs = ['/usr/include/atlas']
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib/atlas-base/atlas', '/usr/lib/atlas-base']
    language = f77
    libraries = ['lapack', 'f77blas', 'cblas', 'atlas', 'f77blas', 'cblas']
    define_macros = [('NO_ATLAS_INFO', -1)]
blas_opt_info:
    library_dirs = ['/usr/lib']
    language = c
    libraries = ['openblas', 'openblas']
    define_macros = [('HAVE_CBLAS', None)]
openblas_lapack_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
atlas_3_10_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
lapack_mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
blas_mkl_info:
  NOT AVAILABLE
```
